name: Missing Toys
description:
You dropped your favorite toy into... a mountain of more toys??

Welcome to Missing Toys. Dig through the toys and identify your missing toy. Bring it to the poster to claim it. This game is for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1, with the theme "It is not real".

How to Play
- Point, click and drag
- Drag toys to the missing poster to check if its correct
- This game relies heavily on color perception
- More items means more points!

Additional Notes
I planned for this to be a 3d game where you spin toys around, and you try to discern between very similar toys. Instead, in this 2D version, the toys all had a front and back version that you could flip between, but 1. The matching colors were already obvious from the start,  2. the way I implemented the click dragging was very  janky, especially given the number of items at a time. Now I feel like it doesn't fully capture the Brackey's theme of it is not real. But nevertheless, I hope you have a little bit of fun~

Credits
Music is 8bitcircus from Antti Luode, Anttis Instrumentals
All art was drawn and colored on Clip Studio Paint
Made on Godot
